Text.Page:
Forest Keepers strive to preserve nature and its balance. Occasionally, this means destroying, not merely protecting.

I need you to kill several {@LinkCreature:26#2004#mossy teraliths}. These ancient guardians can no longer remember their purpose, they're simply mindlessly violent. They threaten more than they protect. We ask you to slay them.
Gratitude, <PCNAME>. A difficult task, but one well-handled.
